DocAttribute.Name: Depth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Web length, see illustration above (= h).

DocAttribute.Name: FlangeWidth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Flange length, see illustration above (= b).

DocAttribute.Name: WebThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Constant wall thickness of web, see illustration above (= ts).

DocAttribute.Name: FlangeThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Constant wall thickness of flange, see illustration above (= tg).

DocAttribute.Name: FilletRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: Fillet radius according the above illustration (= r1).

DocAttribute.Name: EdgeRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: Edge radius according the above illustration (= r2).

DocWhereRule.Name: ValidFlangeThickness
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The flange thickness shall be smaller than half of the depth.
